name: Milo
location: Up the road, to the West ofNelson
descriptions: Ranger Milo is an NCR Ranger living in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281. He is found patrolling at a small NCR checkpoint tasked with locking down the road leading to Nelson and preventing legionaries from leaving or hapless travelers from entering.
Milo is an experienced Ranger normally assigned to Camp Forlorn Hope.
Milo says that he has named his cowboy repeater "Carmine," but in his inventory, it is just a standard repeater.
Milo was written by project director Joshua Sawyer.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Well, well. If it isn't the courier who wiped out the Legion over at Nelson. Good to see you around{nickname for camp}the Hope.{welcoming}

topics.topic_text: The name's &PCName;.
topics.response_text: Oh, heck, I've heard of you. Supposed to be a regular hero or something, ain't that right?

topics.topic_text: Don't you have the authority to command the troopers to go into the camp?
topics.response_text: I'm a ranger. They're troopers. Different branches. I don't have authority over them even though they're as green as a Super Mutant's backside.

topics.topic_text: Understood.
topics.response_text: Much obliged.

topics.topic_text: You've got five seconds to get out of my sight before I shove that rifle where the sun don't shine.
topics.response_text: {suddenly scared}Son of a bitch!

topics.topic_text: I think it's time to knock you down a peg or two, ranger.
topics.response_text: We'll see about that.

topics.topic_text: What needs to be done?
topics.response_text: {sarcastic}If you had a few dozen doses of Psycho on you, maybe we could pep these weepy troopers into charging down into Nelson and taking back the camp.

topics.topic_text: Why take out the hostages?
topics.response_text: The troopers won't go down into the camp with their comrades at risk. Dirty game the Legion likes to roll out whenever they get a chance.

topics.topic_text: [Psycho] Funny you should mention Psycho. I actually have a few dozen doses on me...
topics.response_text: All right, I have to admit I wasn't expecting you to say that. I was just joking. But if it makes you feel any better, I am impressed.

topics.topic_text: Sign me up.
topics.response_text: Good. We clear out the hostages and they lose their advantage. They're down in a clearing, crucified on some telephone poles.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you try to rescue them?
topics.response_text: Back at{sarcastic}"Ranger School", they taught us not to run headlong into a battle when you're outnumbered ten to one.

topics.topic_text: I won't do anything dishonorable, if that's what you mean.
topics.response_text: {laughing a bit}"Dishonorable", that's a good one. Okay then, you can just turn around and head back toward Novac or wherever it is you came from.

topics.topic_text: Are you interested in cracking jokes or getting something done?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{surprised at the player's spunk}Well, I'll be damned. Looks like you've got some dirt in you after all.

topics.topic_text: I can... do bad things.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Right. You have trouble even saying the word "bad". Go on, get out of here if you know what's good for you.

topics.topic_text: Like I care what anyone says about me. Do you want help dealing with the Legion or not?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well, I suppose I don't care much, either. At least not enough to turn down an offer for help.

topics.topic_text: You're an idiot if you believe everything you hear. You want my help or what?
topics.response_text: Well, now that you've sweet-talked me...

topics.topic_text: You may not know me, but I'm no friend of the Legion, and I'll lend a hand to get rid of them.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Fair enough. It's not like any of the troopers around here are jumping up to volunteer.

topics.topic_text: Come on. Let me help out. Trust me.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] That's one of the least trustworthy lines I've ever heard. Sorry. No can do.

topics.topic_text: I don't think I can help you. Sorry.
topics.response_text: That's a shame. Well, let me know if you change your mind or those Legion sons of bitches will be holed up in Nelson for weeks.

topics.topic_text: What happened here?
topics.response_text: Troopers tried moving down from Forlorn Hope because we got this big gap between there and Searchlight. Turns out we were spread too thin.

topics.topic_text: Are there any towns nearby?
topics.response_text: There's Novac, due west. Just look for the big lizard. They got some decent supplies and a place to stay.

topics.topic_text: Are you in charge here?
topics.response_text: Nope. I'm just the only ranger around. The rest of the kids here are troopers, inexperienced, out-numbered and under-equipped.

topics.topic_text: You sure you don't want my help with the Legion?
topics.response_text: I sent you packing last time for a reason. Why should I let you in now?

topics.topic_text: I changed my mind about helping you with your Legion problem. I'm in.
topics.response_text: Good. We clear out the hostages and they lose their advantage. They're down in a clearing, crucified on some telephone poles.

topics.topic_text: I'd really like to help. And what's the worst that could happen, Nelson stays captured?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Good point. Anyway, it's your hide. Guess I should take all the help I can get.

topics.topic_text: Because no one else is going to help you.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Nice speech. Take a hike.

topics.topic_text: Anything I can do to help?
topics.response_text: Maybe. I'd like to know who I'm dealing with, first.

topics.topic_text: Do you have time for a few questions?
topics.response_text: What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: What's the trouble with the Legion?
topics.response_text: Hell, what ain't the trouble with the Legion? This time, they jumped the camp in Nelson while the troopers were setting up

topics.topic_text: I put the captives out of their misery.
topics.response_text: Dirty job, but I'm glad you did it. I'm not authorized to reward contract pay, but here's a little something for you.

topics.topic_text: Looks like I was able to get a few of the hostages out alive.
topics.response_text: I have to admit, I didn't think you could do it. Guess that makes me the sap and you the hero.

topics.topic_text: Nothing new to report on my end.
topics.response_text: Then head back down into that camp and deal with the hostages.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. See you around.
topics.response_text: Bye.

topics.topic_text: I'll be going then.
topics.response_text: Hey, hold on. Just so you know, if you go down into that camp, one of two things is gonna happen.
